# load libraries

```{r}

library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(writexl)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)

```

# load all data

```{r}

reader_survey <- read_csv("dbk_readers_survey.csv")

student_survey73 <- read_csv("reader_survey_students73.xlsx")

student_survey75 <- read_csv("reader_survey_students75.csv")

staff_survey <- read_csv("dbk_staff_survey.xlsx")

```
# how many of each type of responded were there? Are we more popular among younger or older students?
# how many of each gender?
# which content areas most or least popular? among groups?
# what do people want more of? among groups?
# which device most pop?
# likelihood of downloading app frequency
# Where are our folowers? by group?
# 

```{r}

reader_gender <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  group_by(what_is_your_gender) %>%
  count()

```

# 327 people responded

# age range

```{r}

survey_age <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  group_by(what_is_your_age_range_if_under_18_years_old_please_stop_here_and_do_not_complete_this_survey_select_one) %>%
  count()

write_xlsx(survey_age,'C:/Users/Vstav/OneDrive/Documents/GitHub/dbk_datadesk/reader_survey_spring_23/survey_age.xlsx')

```

# faculty v students v residents

```{r}

occupation <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  group_by(i_am_a_select_as_many_as_apply) %>%
  count()
  


```

# frequency of readership frequency? How does that change among groups?

```{r}

frequency <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  group_by(which_best_describes_how_often_you_read_the_diamondback) %>%
  count()


frequency_students <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(i_am_a_select_as_many_as_apply == "UMD student") %>%
  group_by(which_best_describes_how_often_you_read_the_diamondback) %>%
  count()

frequency_employees <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(i_am_a_select_as_many_as_apply == "UMD faculty/staff") %>%
  group_by(which_best_describes_how_often_you_read_the_diamondback) %>%
  count()

frequency_cp <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(i_am_a_select_as_many_as_apply == "College Park citizen or official/non-student") %>%
  group_by(which_best_describes_how_often_you_read_the_diamondback) %>%
  count()

frequency_alum <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(i_am_a_select_as_many_as_apply == "UMD alumni") %>%
  group_by(which_best_describes_how_often_you_read_the_diamondback) %>%
  count()

frequency_parent <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(i_am_a_select_as_many_as_apply == "Parent of a former student") %>%
  group_by(which_best_describes_how_often_you_read_the_diamondback) %>%
  count()

frequency_parent1 <- reader_survey %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(i_am_a_select_as_many_as_apply == "Parent of a current student") %>%
  group_by(which_best_describes_how_often_you_read_the_diamondback) %>%
  count()
  
```
